Package gameengine

Class GameEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameengine.GameEnvironment
  • public class GameEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
    The game-engine and game logic.

        Parameters:
        member - the crew member that consumes the particular item.
        item - is the item being consumed by the crew member
        quantity - number of items consumed by the crew member.

      • pilot

        public void pilot​(CrewMember member1,
                  CrewMember member2,
                  Planet source,
                  Planet destination,
                  RandomEvents random)
        calls the pilot method of the crew member class.
        Parameters:
        member1 - is the main pilot in this case
        member2 - is the co-pilot.
        source - is the current position of the crew.
        destination - is the planet that the crew/spaceship flies to.
        random - object of the random events class.

      • getRandomNumberInRange

        private static int getRandomNumberInRange​(int min,
                                          int max)
        this method is used to generate random number within a certain range. Used for setting a score for the player.
        Parameters:
        min - is the start bound of the range
        max - is the end bound of the range
        Returns:
        a number within the specified range This method was taken from stackoverflow.com by Alexis C.

      • settingScore

        public void settingScore()
        this method is used to generate the score for the player. Score is generated using random number generators and the numbers generated are multiplied by the parts found.

      • getScore

        returns the score of the game

      • searchPlanet

        public boolean searchPlanet​(CrewMember member,
                            java.lang.String planetName)
        method that is used to search the planet for food, money, medicines and space ship parts.
        Parameters:
        member - that searches the planet.
        planetName - is the planet that is being searched.
        Returns:
        true if a space ship part is found else returns false.
